name: Jaeger Automata: Turquoise Requiem
description:
Set in a Sci-Fi magic realism world, enter world of Jaeger Automata: Turquoise Requiem. Follow the journey of Princess Turquoise, heir to the throne of the Azure Kingdom.  Hunt or be hunted by the evil organization "Tartaglia". Gather a line of friends and allies to help you on your quest to get back your kingdom. Be careful who you decide to trust along the way.  

Story, Sprites, BG, GUI by Justen Turner-Thorne IG

Music by Edify Investments

Script Editor: Christina Gilbert

RPG Battle System by Ryokosha
